tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories update_dataset_collection "$history_id" "$dataset_collection_id"
#if $deleted: $deleted #end if #if $name: --name "$name" #end if #if $visible: $visible #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: deleted
param.label: deleted
param.help: Mark or unmark history dataset collection as deleted

param.name: name
param.label: name
param.help: Replace history dataset collection name with the given string

param.name: visible
param.label: visible
param.help: Mark or unmark history dataset collection as visible

tool.help: Update history dataset collection metadata. Some of the attributes that can be modified are documented below.
